scripts.build-all: cd delt-mt && bash build.sh && cd .. && cd delt-ft && bash build.sh && cd .. && cd delt-d && bash build.sh && cd ..
scripts.init-mt: bash near call delt-mt.delt.testnet new_default_meta '{"owner_id": "delt.testnet"}' --accountId delt-mt.delt.testnet
scripts.init-ft: bash near call delt-ft.delt.testnet new_default_meta '{"owner_id": "delt.testnet"}' --accountId delt-ft.delt.testnet
scripts.init-d: bash near call delt-d.delt.testnet new_default_meta '{"owner_id": "delt.testnet"}' --accountId delt-d.delt.testnet
